content: Quando ero giovane, ero un po' trasandato e ci sono stati momenti in cui non mi sono fatto il bagno per due settimane durante l'estate.
translations: eng:When I was young, I was a bit scruffy and there were times when I didn't take a bath for up to two weeks during the summ
